lead_paragraph: Latvian home prices fell in the second part of 2007 by as much as 65 percent, but the market has since stabilized.
snippet: Latvian home prices fell in the second part of 2007 by as much as 65 percent, but the market has since stabilized.
abstract: International House Hunting column; four-bedroom 16th-century barn converted in 2012 to single-family home in Old Town section of Riga, Latvia is listed at $3.62 million; information about market and tips for buying in Latvia highlighted.
